## date_time_tag(name, [[value,] html_options])
Creates a date_time select sequence, defaults to 24 hour

options

* start_year
* end_year
* twelvehour:			set to true if 12 hours is needed
* minute_interval:		set to int value if intervals in minutes are needed
* show_seconds:		set to true if seconds are needed

if no value is given the it defaults to current date and time.

	date_time_tag('Installation[time]', new Date(2007,10,20,1,1,1,1) )
	 
	 => 
	 
	<select id='Installation[datetime][year]' value='2007' name='Installation[datetime][year]' ><option value='1960' >1960</option><option value='1961' >1961</option><option value='1962' >1962</option><option value='1963' >1963</option><option value='1964' >1964</option><option value='1965' >1965</option><option value='1966' >1966</option><option value='1967' >1967</option><option
